intro: Scaphyglottis kienastii, commonly known as the Kienast's scaphyglottis, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, which includes many diverse and showy orchid species. The plant is characterized by its unique, spurred flowers that are often brightly colored, typically in shades of yellow or orange. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Due to its specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native range.
